member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_RENDER_TARGET_DESC
member.summary: Describes bindings (fixed for the duration of the render pass) to one or more render target views (RTVs), as well as their beginning and ending access characteristics.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_RENDER_TARGET_DESC.cpuDescriptor
member.summary: A . The CPU descriptor handle corresponding to the render target view(s) (RTVs).

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_RENDER_TARGET_DESC.BeginningAccess
member.summary: A . The access to the RTV(s) requested at the transition into a render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_RENDER_TARGET_DESC.EndingAccess
member.summary: A . The access to the RTV(s) requested at the transition out of a render pass.
